name: incorta-chart-assistant-monorepo
description: Monorepo for Incorta Chart Assistant with live preview and export

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:chat" "npm run dev:preview" "npm run dev:export"
scripts.dev:export: cd services/export-service && source venv/bin/activate && uvicorn app.main:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8080 --reload
scripts.build: npm run build:chat && npm run build:preview
scripts.install:all: npx pnpm install && npm run setup:python
scripts.setup:python: cd services/export-service && python3 -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
